mapper.select: SELECT skd_no, skd_type, skd_title, skd_start_date,skd_end_date, skd_share FROM schedule WHERE employee_id=#{employeeId} AND skd_share ='p' UNION ALL SELECT skd_no, skd_type, skd_title, skd_start_date, skd_end_date, skd_share FROM schedule WHERE employee_id like '${department.departmentId}%' and skd_share = 't' ORDER BY skd_start_date ASC

SELECT skd_no, skd_type, skd_title, skd_content,skd_start_date,skd_end_date, skd_share FROM schedule WHERE employee_id=#{emp} AND skd_share ='p' AND skd_start_date BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} UNION ALL SELECT skd_no, skd_type, skd_title,skd_content,skd_start_date,skd_end_date, skd_share FROM schedule WHERE employee_id like '${dpt}%' and skd_share = 't' AND skd_start_date BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} ORDER BY skd_start_date ASC

SELECT skd_type, skd_title, skd_start_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi', skd_end_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi' FROM schedule WHERE employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM employee WHERE department_id =#{skd_dpt_id}) AND skd_share='t'
SELECT skd_type, skd_title,skd_start_date, skd_end_date FROM schedule WHERE employee_id= #{employeeId} AND skd_share='p'

SELECT skd_no, skd_type, skd_title, skd_content, skd_start_date, skd_end_date, skd_share FROM schedule WHERE employee_id= #{skdId.employeeId} AND (skd_title like '%${skdTitle}%' OR skd_content like '$%{skdContent}%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule(skd_no, skd_type, employee_id, skd_title,skd_content, skd_date, skd_start_date, skd_end_date, skd_share) VALUES (SKD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{skdType.skdType}, #{skdId.employeeId}, #{skdTitle}, #{skdContent}, sysdate, #{skdStartDate}, #{skdEndDate}, #{skdShare})
mapper.delete: delete from schedule where skd_no= #{skdNo} AND employee_id = #{skdId.employeeId}
